plot: The movie is about a simple village girl played by Zeenat Aman who changes into a dreaded thief and bandit who creates havoc on the village and the police after her parents are killed by the village head and others.
title: Daku Hasina
plot_es: The movie is about a simple village girl played by Zeenat Aman who changes into a dreaded thief and bandit who creates havoc on the village and the police after her parents are killed by the village head and others.
